text: == Events == * October 29 â€“ Battle of Brusthem: Charles the Bold defeats Liege * Beginning of the Sengoku Period in Japan. * Circa this year, polyalphabetic cipher invented by Leone Battista Alberti. * Regent of Sweden Erik Axelsson Tott supports the re-election of deposed Charles VIII of Sweden to the throne. * Pope Paul II arrested and tortured some of the abbreviators, among them was Filip Callimachus.
